common_questions: How can a machine really learn?
Actually our current rate is X, would you be willing to work with that?
explained that it would be a good way to learn more languages and practice our design s
What is your Name, Current location(State) and Phone number?
describe your work experience, especially the aspects of Data entry?
What is your Clerical Speed or WPM?
What is your greatest professional achievement?
explaining what the company and position entails
What is your mobile deposit limit?
What is your preferred email to receive the check?
and he froze up as he had no more questions
interview_tips: that you make the cutoff based on salary range while asking for as much as possible
they know you are open to negotiations
trying to get the company to confirm the numbers via email, though some mf’s will call you back to confirm)
they understand that the reason you turn them down is their salary is designed to fish at the bottom of the barrel and that's not where you swim
they know that you leave because the pay is shit
to make it clear that you are interested in the company and are not just trying to negotiate for the sake of negotiation
if you are going through the FDM interview process is to receive an offer from them, and use the more “glamorous” parts of that offer as leverage for
listening to the podcast On Being with Krista Tippet
numerous subreddits like DepthHub and FoodforThought
red_flags: give a shit about your salary
say "uh our rate is actually less" then you didn't ask for enough
want the number to stay in a way of us talking
agree on the spot, they never expect you to
provided an offer letter and it has never been an issue (for FAANG as well)
TAKE LESS MONEY THAN THE MARKET AVERAGE

process_insights.format: Mix of phone screen, technical, behavioral, on-site, virtual
